Special Powers
TO BE HONEST, THIS IS WAY OVERDUE: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character of 75 points or more with the Monster keyword is KO'd, after resolutions you may generate Deadpool on his red starting line from your sideline in that character's square.
MRRRRR!: FREE: Once per game, generate a Jeff bystander.

December 9, 2021
Goop
When Jeff dies he allows Deadpool to heal past his starting line so this click is probably the better play for him. You base over and over with jeff, your opponent has to kill him and then deadpool can charge out with flurry/steal energy. For 40 points i think he's quite good as long as you can get them to kill jeff.
